name: Glitch-Thru
description:
A Prototype for a one of a kind platformer.  Hack Thru Walls, and adventure thru a dystopian future.  If you want, you can even hack into the game yourself!  Simply comment on this reddit post (https://www.reddit.com/r/GameDevelopment/comments/mmyjnk/just_released_a_prototy...)!

This game is very much a prototype.   It merely shows the possibilities of the game mechanics and api.
